hanoi.name: Associate Professor, Doctor, Doctor Nguyen Tho Lo
hanoi.description: Former Deputy Director of Military Hospital 103. Specialist in Cranial and Spinal Neurology. Former Vice President of Vietnam Association of Neurosurgery. Doctor examines patients 13 years of age and older
hanoi.address: No. 52 Nguyen Chi Thanh - Dong Da - Hanoi

hanoi.name: Associate Professor, Doctor, Doctor Nguyen Trong Hung
hanoi.description: Former Head of Department of Psychiatry - Central Geriatric Hospital. Former Doctor of Neurology - Bach Mai Hospital. Doctor examines patients from 3 years old and up

hcm.name: Specialist Doctor I Ngo Duc Truong
hcm.description: Doctor used to work at Phuong Dong Hospital - 79 Thanh Thai, Ward 14, District 10, City. Ho Chi Minh City. Doctor has nearly 30 years of experience in Neuro-Spine specialty
hcm.address: No. 722 Su Van Hanh, Ward 12, District 10, City. Ho Chi Minh

hcm.name: Specialist Doctor I Tran Minh Tran
hcm.description: Specialist in General Internal Medicine. Many years of experience in examination and treatment of general internal diseases, internal neurology
hcm.address: 525/15 Su Van Hanh, Ward 12, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City
